Title: Relates to authorizing the commissioner of education to promulgate rules and regulations authorizing school programs designed to educate students on the dangers of alcohol
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of education to promulgate rules and regulations authorizing school curriculums to include programs designed to educate students on the immediate and consequential dangers associated with the use of alcohol.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to instruction relating to the dangers associated with the use of alcohol
